Life:Be-Born.degree-definition: The event is related to life and someone is given birth to.

Life:Marry.degree-definition: The event is related to life and someone is married.

args.Person: Who marry or who are married

Life:Divorce.degree-definition: The event is related to life and someone was divorced.

Life:Injure.degree-definition: The event is related to life and someone is injured.
Life:Injure.degree-template: somebody or some organization led to some victim injured by some way in somewhere.

args.Instrument: What device is used to cause the injury

Life:Die.degree-definition: The event is related to life and someone died.
Life:Die.degree-template: somebody or some organization led to some victim died by some way in somewhere.

args.Instrument: What device is used to cause the death

Movement:Transport.definition: some people or something move from one place to another
Movement:Transport.degree-definition: The event is related to movement. The event occurs when a weapon or vehicle is moved from one place to another.
Movement:Transport.degree-template: something was sent to somewhere from some place by some vehicle, and somebody or some organization was responsible for the transport.

args.Agent: Who are responsible for or promote the movement
args.Vehicle: What vehicle is used to move the people or the things
args.Destination: Where the movement is directed to

Transaction:Transfer-Ownership.definition: some people sell, buy, give, get, lend, or borrow something
Transaction:Transfer-Ownership.degree-definition: The event occurs when an item or an organization is sold or gave to some other.
Transaction:Transfer-Ownership.degree-template: someone got something from somewhere in somewhere.

Transaction:Transfer-Money.definition: some people give, get, lend, or borrow money
Transaction:Transfer-Money.degree-definition: The event is related to transaction. The event occurs when someone is giving, receiving, borrowing, or lending money.
Transaction:Transfer-Money.degree-template: someone paid some other in somewhere.

Business:Start-Org.degree-definition: The event is related to a new organization being created.
Business:Start-Org.degree-template: somebody or some organization launched some organization in somewhere.

Business:Merge-Org.definition: two or more organizations come together to form a new organization
Business:Merge-Org.degree-definition: The event is related to two or more organization coming together to form a new organization.

Business:Declare-Bankruptcy.degree-definition: The event is related to some organization declaring bankruptcy.

Business:End-Org.degree-definition: The event is related to some organization ceasing to exist.

Conflict:Attack.definition: some attackers attack some people or something
Conflict:Attack.degree-definition: The event is related to conflict and some violent physical act.
Conflict:Attack.degree-template: some attacker attacked some facility, someone, or some organization by some way in somewhere.

args.Attacker: Who attack or instigate the attack
args.Target: What is the target of the attack (including unintended targets)
args.Instrument: What instrument is used in the attack

Conflict:Demonstrate.degree-definition: The event is related to a large number of people coming together to protest.
Conflict:Demonstrate.degree-template: some people or some organization protested at somewhere.

Contact:Meet.definition: some people meet and interact with others face-to-face
Contact:Meet.degree-definition: The event is related to a group of people meeting and interacting with one another face-to-face.
Contact:Meet.degree-template: some people or some organization met at somewhere.

args.Entity: Who meet and interact with one another

Contact:Phone-Write.definition: some people phone call or message others
Contact:Phone-Write.degree-definition: The event is related to people phone calling or messaging one another.
Contact:Phone-Write.degree-template: some people or some organization called or texted messages at somewhere.

args.Entity: Who phone call or message others

Personnel:Start-Position.definition: some people begin working for others
Personnel:Start-Position.degree-definition: The event is related to a person begins working for an organization or a hiring manager.
Personnel:Start-Position.degree-template: somebody got new job and was hired by some people or some organization in somewhere.

args.Entity: Who or what organization do the people work for

Personnel:End-Position.definition: some people stop working for others
Personnel:End-Position.degree-definition: The event is related to a person stops working for an organization or a hiring manager.
Personnel:End-Position.degree-template: somebody stopped working for some people or some organization at somewhere.

args.Entity: Who or what organization did the people used to work for

Personnel:Nominate.definition: some people are nominated for a position
Personnel:Nominate.degree-definition: The event is related to a person being nominated for a position.
Personnel:Nominate.degree-template: somebody was nominated by some people or some organization to do a job.

Personnel:Elect.degree-definition: The event is related to a candidate wins an election.
Personnel:Elect.degree-template: somebody was elected a position, and the election was voted by some people or some organization in somewhere.

args.Entity: What organization is the people elected to

Justice:Arrest-Jail.definition: some people are jailed or arrested
Justice:Arrest-Jail.degree-definition: The event is related to a person getting arrested or a person being sent to jail.
Justice:Arrest-Jail.degree-template: somebody was sent to jailed or arrested by somebody or some organization in somewhere.

args.Agent: Who jail or arrest the people

Justice:Release-Parole.degree-definition: The event is related to an end to someone's custody in prison.
Justice:Release-Parole.degree-template: somebody was released by some people or some organization from somewhere.

args.Entity: Who release or request the release of the people

Justice:Trial-Hearing.definition: some people are on trial or given a hearing
Justice:Trial-Hearing.degree-definition: The event is related to a trial or hearing for someone.
Justice:Trial-Hearing.degree-template: somebody, prosecuted by some other, faced a trial in somewhere, and the hearing was judged by some adjudicator.

args.Defendant: Who are on trial or given a hearing
args.Adjudicator: What judge or court presides over the trial

Justice:Charge-Indict.definition: some people are accused or indicted
Justice:Charge-Indict.degree-definition: The event is related to someone or some organization being accused of a crime.
Justice:Charge-Indict.degree-template: somebody was charged by some other in somewhere, and the adjudication was judged by some adjudicator.

args.Prosecutor: Who accuse or indicte the people
args.Adjudicator: What judge or court accepts the accusation

Justice:Sue.definition: some people are sued by others
Justice:Sue.degree-definition: The event is related to a court proceeding that has been initiated and someone sue the other.
Justice:Sue.degree-template: somebody was sued by some other in somewhere, and the adjudication was judged by some adjudicator.

args.Adjudicator: What judge or court accepts the lawsuit

Justice:Convict.definition: some people are convicted of a crime
Justice:Convict.degree-definition: The event is related to someone being found guilty of a crime.
Justice:Convict.degree-template: somebody was convicted of a crime in somewhere, and the adjudication was judged by some adjudicator.

Justice:Sentence.definition: some people are sentenced to punishment because of a crime
Justice:Sentence.degree-definition: The event is related to someone being sentenced to punishment because of a crime.
Justice:Sentence.degree-template: somebody was sentenced to punishment in somewhere, and the adjudication was judged by some adjudicator.

args.Adjudicator: What judge or court sentences the people

Justice:Fine.definition: some people or some organizations are fined
Justice:Fine.degree-definition: The event is related to someone being issued a financial punishment.
Justice:Fine.degree-template: some people or some organization in somewhere was ordered by some adjudicator to pay a fine.

args.Entity: Who or what organizations are fined
args.Adjudicator: Who fine the people or the organizations

Justice:Execute.definition: some people are executed to death
Justice:Execute.degree-definition: The event is related to someone being executed to death.
Justice:Execute.degree-template: somebody was executed by somebody or some organization at somewhere.

Justice:Extradite.definition: some people are extradited from one place to another place
Justice:Extradite.degree-definition: The event is related to justice. The event occurs when a person was extradited from one place to another place.
Justice:Extradite.degree-template: somebody was extradicted to somewhere from some place, and somebody or some organization was responsible for the extradition.

args.Agent: Who are responsible for or promote the extradition
args.Destination: Where are the people extradited to
args.Origin: where are the people extradited from

Justice:Acquit.degree-definition: The event is related to someone being acquitted.
Justice:Acquit.degree-template: somebody was acquitted of the charges by some adjudicator.

args.Adjudicator: What judge or court acquits the people

Justice:Pardon.degree-definition: The event is related to someone being pardoned.
Justice:Pardon.degree-template: somebody received a pardon from some adjudicator.

args.Adjudicator: What state official does the pardoning

Justice:Appeal.definition: some people appeal the decision of a court
Justice:Appeal.degree-definition: The event is related to someone appealing the decision of a court.
Justice:Appeal.degree-template: some other in somewhere appealed the adjudication from some adjudicator.

args.Adjudicator: What judge or court receive the appeal
